title: How to Play Heroes vs Monsters

steps.headline: Search for "Heroes vs Monsters" on the App Store and download the app.
Walk around by tapping where you want your player to move.
steps.description: Keep walking around until you find a battle (not including boss battles) between levels 1 and 4, then tap "fight."

steps.headline: Tap one of your heroes when combat starts.
steps.description: Tap an enemy you want it to fight; and repeat with other heroes. If one of your heroes is close to death, tap the cleric and slide your finger or stylus from the cleric to that hero. Use your heroes' powers by tapping the right-hand corner after tapping the hero you would like to use. Repeat these steps until the battle has been won or lost.

steps.headline: Look out for when a hero levels up.
steps.description: Then go into the skills section and tap that hero. Look at one of the boxes with green numbers, and tap the learn button at the bottom left corner of your screen.

steps.headline: Do this with all of your other heroes when they level up.
Collect gold to use in the shop by winning battles or by selling items from your inventory to instead of spending real money for a fake currency.
Check the shop for items that your heroes can use.
steps.description: Tap the hero that you are buying an item for to make sure they can use it. If the item turns red, your hero cannot use this item!.

steps.headline: If you want to put better equipment on your heroes, go to the stash.
Wait until your heroes are at least level 7.
steps.description: Then fight the first boss by going to the castle in your vision. More of your map will be visible if you win this battle.

steps.headline: Fight the next boss once your heroes reach level 12.
steps.description: Keep fighting regular battles to level up your heroes.

steps.headline: Challenge the next boss when your heroes are level 21.
Congratulations!
steps.description: These are the basics of Heroes vs Monsters. Keep battling and defeating bosses to continue unlocking more heroes and features of the game.

text: Search for "Heroes vs Monsters" on the App Store and download the app.  Open it. Tap "play" to start the game. Play through the introduction.  Walk around by tapping where you want your player to move. Keep walking around until you find a battle (not including boss battles) between levels 1 and 4, then tap "fight." Tap one of your heroes when combat starts. Tap an enemy you want it to fight; and repeat with other heroes. If one of your heroes is close to death, tap the cleric and slide your finger or stylus from the cleric to that hero. Use your heroes' powers by tapping the right-hand corner after tapping the hero you would like to use. Repeat these steps until the battle has been won or lost. Look out for when a hero levels up. Then go into the skills section and tap that hero. Look at one of the boxes with green numbers, and tap the learn button at the bottom left corner of your screen. Do this with all of your other heroes when they level up.  Collect gold to use in the shop by winning battles or by selling items from your inventory to instead of spending real money for a fake currency.  Check the shop for items that your heroes can use. Tap the hero that you are buying an item for to make sure they can use it. If the item turns red, your hero cannot use this item!. If you want to put better equipment on your heroes, go to the stash.  Wait until your heroes are at least level 7. Then fight the first boss by going to the castle in your vision. More of your map will be visible if you win this battle. Fight the next boss once your heroes reach level 12. Keep fighting regular battles to level up your heroes. Challenge the next boss when your heroes are level 21.  Congratulations! These are the basics of Heroes vs Monsters. Keep battling and defeating bosses to continue unlocking more heroes and features of the game.
